00018   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d",name,&num_tables,&bim_size,&table_size,&tag_width,&first_length,&last_length) != 7)
00019     fatal("bad bpred options string %s (should be \"tage:name:num-tables:bim-size:table-size:tag-width:first-hist-length:last-hist-length\")",opt_string);

00024 #include <math.h>

00027 class bpred_tage_t:public bpred_dir_t
00028 {
00029 #define TAGE_MAX_HIST 512
00030 #define TAGE_MAX_TABLES 16
00031 
00032   typedef qword_t bpred_tage_hist_t[8]; /* Max length: 8 * 64 = 512 */
00033 
00034   struct bpred_tage_ent_t
00035   {
00036     int tag;
00037     char ctr;
00038     char u;
00039   };
00040 
00041   class bpred_tage_sc_t:public bpred_sc_t
00042   {
00043     public:
00044     my2bc_t * current_ctr;
00045     bpred_tage_hist_t lookup_bhr;
00046     int index[TAGE_MAX_TABLES];
00047     int provider;
00048     int provpred;
00049     int alt;
00050     int altpred;
00051     int used_alt;
00052     int provnew;
00053   };
00054 
00055   private:
00056 
00057   inline void bpred_tage_hist_update(bpred_tage_hist_t H, int outcome)
00058   {
00059     H[7] <<= 1; H[7] |= (H[6]>>63)&1;
00060     H[6] <<= 1; H[6] |= (H[5]>>63)&1;
00061     H[5] <<= 1; H[5] |= (H[4]>>63)&1;
00062     H[4] <<= 1; H[4] |= (H[3]>>63)&1;
00063     H[3] <<= 1; H[3] |= (H[2]>>63)&1;
00064     H[2] <<= 1; H[2] |= (H[1]>>63)&1;
00065     H[1] <<= 1; H[1] |= (H[0]>>63)&1;
00066     H[0] <<= 1; H[0] |= outcome&1;
00067   }
00068 
00069   inline void bpred_tage_hist_copy(bpred_tage_hist_t D /*dest*/, bpred_tage_hist_t S /*src*/)
00070   {
00071     D[0] = S[0];
00072     D[1] = S[1];
00073     D[2] = S[2];
00074     D[3] = S[3];
00075     D[4] = S[4];
00076     D[5] = S[5];
00077     D[6] = S[6];
00078     D[7] = S[7];
00079   }
00080 
00081   int bpred_tage_hist_hash(bpred_tage_hist_t H, int hist_length, int hash_length)
00082   {
00083     int result = 0;
00084     int i;
00085     int mask = (1<<hash_length)-1;
00086     int row=0;
00087     int pos=0;
00088     for(i=0;i<hist_length/hash_length;i++)
00089     {
00090       result ^= (H[row]>>pos) & mask;
00091       if(pos+hash_length > 64) /* wrap past end of current qword_t */
00092       {
00093         row++;
00094         pos = (pos+hash_length)&63;
00095         result ^= (H[row]<<(hash_length-pos))&mask;
00096       }
00097       else /* includes when pos+HL is exactly 64 */
00098       {
00099         pos = pos+hash_length;
00100         if(pos > 63)
00101         {
00102           pos &=63;
00103           row++;
00104         }
00105       }
00106     }
00107     return result;
00108   }
00109

00124   struct bpred_tage_ent_t **T;

00133   /* CREATE */
00134   bpred_tage_t(char * const arg_name,
00135                const int arg_num_tables,
00136                const int arg_bim_size,
00137                const int arg_table_size,
00138                const int arg_tag_width,
00139                const int arg_first_length,
00140                const int arg_last_length
00141               )
00142   {
00143     init();
00144 
00145     int i;
00146     /* verify arguments are valid */
00147     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_bim_size);
00148     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_table_size);
00149     CHECK_POS(arg_num_tables);
00150     CHECK_POS(arg_tag_width);
00151     CHECK_POS(arg_first_length);
00152     CHECK_POS(arg_last_length);
00153     CHECK_POS_GT(arg_last_length,arg_first_length);
00154     CHECK_POS_LT(arg_num_tables,TAGE_MAX_TABLES);
00155     CHECK_POS_LEQ(arg_last_length,TAGE_MAX_HIST);
00156 
00157     for(i=0;i<8;i++)
00158       bhr[i] = 0;
00159 
00160     name = strdup(arg_name);
00161     if(!name)
00162       fatal("couldn't malloc tage name (strdup)");
00163     type = strdup(COMPONENT_NAME);
00164     if(!type)
00165       fatal("couldn't malloc tage type (strdup)");
00166 
00167     num_tables = arg_num_tables;
00168     table_size = arg_table_size;
00169     table_mask = arg_table_size-1;
00170     log_size = log_base2(arg_table_size);
00171 
00172     bim_size = arg_bim_size;
00173     bim_mask = arg_bim_size-1;
00174 
00175     double logA = (log(arg_last_length) - log(arg_first_length)) / ((double)arg_num_tables - 2.0);
00176     alpha = (int) exp(logA);
00177 
00178     Hlen = (int*) calloc(arg_num_tables,sizeof(*Hlen));
00179     if(!Hlen)
00180       fatal("couldn't calloc Hlen array");
00181 
00182     /* Hlen[0] = 0; set by calloc, for 2bc */
00183     for(i=1;i<num_tables-1;i++)
00184       Hlen[i] = (int)floor(arg_first_length * pow(alpha,i-1) + 0.5);
00185     Hlen[i] = arg_last_length;
00186 
00187     T = (struct bpred_tage_ent_t**) calloc(num_tables,sizeof(*T));
00188     if(!T)
00189       fatal("couldn't calloc tage T array");
00190 
00191     tag_width = arg_tag_width;
00192     tag_mask = (1<<arg_tag_width)-1;
00193 
00194     for(i=0;i<num_tables;i++)
00195     {
00196       if(i>0)
00197       {
00198         T[i] = (struct bpred_tage_ent_t*) calloc(table_size,sizeof(**T));
00199         if(!T[i])
00200           fatal("couldn't calloc tage T[%d]",i);
00201         for(int j=0;j<table_size;j++)
00202         {
00203           T[i][j].tag = 0;
00204           T[i][j].ctr = 4; /* weakly taken */
00205         }
00206       }
00207       else /* T0 */
00208       {
00209         T[i] = (struct bpred_tage_ent_t*) calloc(bim_size,sizeof(**T));
00210         if(!T[i])
00211           fatal("couldn't calloc tage T[%d]",i);
00212         for(int j=0;j<bim_size;j++)
00213           T[i][j].ctr = MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN; /* weakly taken */
00214       }
00215     }
00216 
00217     Tuses = (counter_t*) calloc(num_tables,sizeof(*Tuses));
00218     if(!Tuses)
00219       fatal("failed to calloc Tuses");
00220 
00221     pwin = 15;
00222 
00223     bits = bim_size*2 /*2bc*/ + (num_tables-1)*(2/*u*/+3/*ctr*/+tag_width)*table_size + arg_last_length + 4/*use altpred?*/;
00224   }
00225 
00226   /* DESTROY */
00227   ~bpred_tage_t()
00228   {
00229     free(Tuses); Tuses = NULL;
00230     for(int i=0;i<num_tables;i++)
00231     {
00232       free(T[i]); T[i] = NULL;
00233     }
00234     free(T); T = NULL;
00235     free(Hlen); Hlen = NULL;
00236   }
00237 
00238   /* LOOKUP */
00239   BPRED_LOOKUP_HEADER
00240   {
00241     class bpred_tage_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_tage_sc_t*) scvp;
00242 
00243     for(int i=0;i<num_tables;i++)
00244     {
00245       if(i==0)
00246         sc->index[i] = PC;
00247       else
00248         sc->index[i] = PC^bpred_tage_hist_hash(bhr,Hlen[i],log_size);
00249     }
00250     sc->provider = 0;
00251     sc->provpred = 0;
00252     sc->altpred = 0;
00253     sc->provnew = false;
00254 
00255     int hit = false;
00256     int pwin_hit = false;
00257     for(int i=num_tables-1;i>0;i--)
00258     {
00259       struct bpred_tage_ent_t * ent = &T[i][sc->index[i]&table_mask];
00260       if(((unsigned)ent->tag) == (PC&tag_mask))
00261       {
00262         sc->provnew = !ent->u && ((ent->ctr==4) || (ent->ctr==3));
00263         if((pwin < 8) || !sc->provnew)
00264           pwin_hit = true;
00265         sc->provpred = (ent->ctr >= 4);
00266         hit = true;
00267         sc->provider = i;
00268         break;
00269       }
00270     }
00271 
00272     sc->alt = -1;
00273     if(hit)
00274     {
00275       for(int i=sc->provider-1;i>0;i--)
00276       {
00277         struct bpred_tage_ent_t * ent = &T[i][sc->index[i]&table_mask];
00278         if((unsigned)ent->tag == (PC&tag_mask))
00279         {
00280           sc->altpred = (ent->ctr >= 4);
00281           sc->alt = i;
00282           break;
00283         }
00284       }
00285     }
00286 
00287     if(sc->alt == -1)
00288     {
00289       sc->altpred = MY2BC_DIR(T[0][sc->index[0]&bim_mask].ctr);
00290       sc->alt = 0;
00291     }
00292 
00293     sc->updated = false;
00294 
00295     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00296     bpred_tage_hist_copy(sc->lookup_bhr,bhr);
00297 
00298     if(!pwin_hit)
00299     {
00300       sc->used_alt = true;
00301       return sc->altpred;
00302     }
00303     else
00304     {
00305       sc->used_alt = false;
00306       return sc->provpred;
00307     }
00308   }
00309 
00310   /* UPDATE */
00311   BPRED_UPDATE_HEADER
00312   {
00313     class bpred_tage_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_tage_sc_t*) scvp;
00314 
00315     if(!sc->updated)
00316     {
00317       BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00318       BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00319 
00320       if(sc->used_alt)
00321         Tuses[sc->alt]++;
00322       else
00323       {
00324         assert(sc->provider);
00325         Tuses[sc->provider]++;
00326       }
00327 
00328 
00329       if(sc->provnew)
00330       {
00331         if(sc->altpred != sc->provpred)
00332         {
00333           if(sc->altpred == outcome)
00334           {
00335             if(pwin < 15)
00336               pwin++;
00337           }
00338           else
00339           {
00340             if(pwin > 0)
00341               pwin--;
00342           }
00343         }
00344       }
00345 
00346       /* Allocate new entry if needed */
00347       if(our_pred != outcome) /* mispred */
00348       {
00349         if(sc->provider < (num_tables-1)) /* not already using longest history */
00350         {
00351           int allocated = 0;
00352           int allocated2 = 0;
00353           for(int i=sc->provider+1;i<num_tables;i++)
00354           {
00355             if(T[i][sc->index[i]&table_mask].u == 0)
00356             {
00357               if(!allocated)
00358                 allocated = i;
00359               else
00360               {
00361                 allocated2 = i;
00362                 break;
00363               }
00364             }
00365           }
00366           if(allocated)
00367           {
00368             if(allocated2) /* more than one choice */
00369             {
00370               if((random() & 0xffff) > 21845) /* choose allocated over allocated2 with 2:1 probability */
00371                 allocated = allocated2;
00372             }
00373             struct bpred_tage_ent_t * ent = &T[allocated][sc->index[allocated]&table_mask];
00374             ent->u = 0;
00375             ent->ctr = 3+outcome;
00376             ent->tag = PC & tag_mask;
00377           }
00378           else
00379           {
00380             for(int i=sc->provider+1;i<num_tables;i++)
00381               if(T[i][sc->index[i]&table_mask].u > 0)
00382                 T[i][sc->index[i]&table_mask].u --;
00383           }
00384         }
00385       }
00386 
00387       /* perioidic reset of ubits */
00388       if((updates & ((1<<18)-1)) == 0)
00389       {
00390         int mask = ~1;
00391         if(updates & (1<<18)) /* alternate reset msb and lsb */
00392           mask = ~2;
00393         for(int i=1;i<num_tables;i++)
00394         {
00395           for(int j=0;j<table_size;j++)
00396             T[i][j].u &= mask;
00397         }
00398       }
00399 
00400       /* update provider component */
00401       if((sc->provider == 0) || ((sc->alt == 0) && (sc->used_alt)))
00402         MY2BC_UPDATE(T[0][sc->index[0]&bim_mask].ctr,outcome);
00403       else
00404       {
00405         if(outcome)
00406         {
00407           if(T[sc->provider][sc->index[sc->provider]&table_mask].ctr < 7)
00408             T[sc->provider][sc->index[sc->provider]&table_mask].ctr ++;
00409         }
00410         else
00411         {
00412           if(T[sc->provider][sc->index[sc->provider]&table_mask].ctr > 0)
00413             T[sc->provider][sc->index[sc->provider]&table_mask].ctr --;
00414         }
00415       }
00416 
00417       /* update u counter: inc if correct and different than altpred */
00418       if(sc->provpred != sc->altpred)
00419       {
00420         if(sc->provpred == outcome)
00421         {
00422           if(T[sc->provider][sc->index[sc->provider]&table_mask].u < 3)
00423             T[sc->provider][sc->index[sc->provider]&table_mask].u ++;
00424         }
00425         else
00426         {
00427           if(T[sc->provider][sc->index[sc->provider]&table_mask].u > 0)
00428             T[sc->provider][sc->index[sc->provider]&table_mask].u --;
00429         }
00430       }
00431 
00432       sc->updated = true;
00433     }
00434   }
00435 
00436   /* SPEC UPDATE */
00437   BPRED_SPEC_UPDATE_HEADER
00438   {
00439     BPRED_STAT(spec_updates++;)
00440     bpred_tage_hist_update(bhr,our_pred);
00441   }
00442 
00443   BPRED_RECOVER_HEADER
00444   {
00445     class bpred_tage_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_tage_sc_t*) scvp;
00446 
00447     bpred_tage_hist_copy(bhr,sc->lookup_bhr);
00448     bpred_tage_hist_update(bhr,outcome);
00449   }
00450 
00451   BPRED_FLUSH_HEADER
00452   {
00453     class bpred_tage_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_tage_sc_t*) scvp;
00454 
00455     bpred_tage_hist_copy(bhr,sc->lookup_bhr);
00456   }
00457 
00458   /* REG_STATS */
00459   BPRED_REG_STATS_HEADER
00460   {
00461     bpred_dir_t::reg_stats(sdb,core);
00462     int id = core?core->current_thread->id:0;
00463     for(int i=0;i<num_tables;i++)
00464     {
00465       char buf[256];
00466       char buf2[256];
00467 
00468       sprintf(buf,"c%d.%s.uses%d",id,name,i);
00469       sprintf(buf2,"predictions made with %s's T[%d]",name,i);
00470       stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, buf2, &Tuses[i], 0, NULL);
00471     }
00472   }
00473 
00474   /* GETCACHE */
00475   BPRED_GET_CACHE_HEADER
00476   {
00477     class bpred_tage_sc_t * sc = new bpred_tage_sc_t();
00478     if(!sc)
00479       fatal("couldn't malloc tage State Cache");
00480     return sc;
00481   }
